name: Eien no tomo
description:
Synopsis

A student got left behind during a christmas mid semester break. Left alone, the student decides to hang out with the only other person that didn't go on a christmas holiday. A lecturer known as Mr.K who for some reason decides to stay and work during the holidays because he doesn't feel like celebrating the holidays.

Description

A game made by a lecturer and his students within a christmas mid semester break. Very meta isn't it. The story is about what happened during that mid semester break with an added twist of what happened to the lecturer in the past. Based loosely on a real story

Its not 18+ so kids can enjoy but Beware it touches upon death, depression and loneliness.
